terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to Coach Online. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Coach Online's website.
terms.acceptanceDescription: By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions in full. Do not continue to use Coach Online's website if you do not accept all the terms and conditions stated on this page.
terms.modificationsDescription: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on our website. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically.
terms.usageDescription: The use of this website is subject to the following terms of use:
terms.contentChanges: The content of the pages of this website is for your general information and use only. It is subject to change without notice.
terms.cookies: This website uses cookies to monitor browsing preferences.
terms.noWarranty: Neither we nor any third parties provide any warranty or guarantee as to the accuracy, timeliness, performance, completeness or suitability of the information and materials found or offered on this website for any particular purpose.
terms.atOwnRisk: Your use of any information or materials on this website is entirely at your own risk, for which we shall not be liable.
terms.intellectualPropertyDescription: This website contains material which is owned by or licensed to us. This material includes, but is not limited to, the design, layout, look, appearance, and graphics. Reproduction is prohibited except in accordance with the copyright notice, which forms part of these terms and conditions.
terms.contactDescription: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at contacto@coachonline.com.
